Content.Text:
<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hrnnn... These trees are in the way.
<PAGE>
Ala-ka-zim, ala-ka-zam, ala-ka-ZAP! Outta my
way, you leaf-limbed lugs!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, I guess this place'll do.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Now, time to build my ultra fantasy dream
home!
<PAGE>
Hrnnnnnn...Sha-wa-wa-FOOM!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yaaaay! It actually worked! ♪
<PAGE>
Heh heh. I always knew I was the best. Let's
have a look inside!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Yay! It's just like the pictures I put in my
scrapbook! Wheeheehee! ♪

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
You're <MYNAME> the farmer, right? What do
you want with me?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You followed me because I made the trees
disappear with my magic?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? I know I'm super awesome, but is magic
that conspicuous around here?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Really? You think I'm amazing? Well of course I
am!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My name is <BLUE>Witchie</BLUE>!
<PAGE>
I'm an ultra-cool and powerful witch! You can
look up to me in admiration -- I wouldn't blame
you, what with how great I am.

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
You know, you seem awfully nice and obedient
for a human, <MYNAME>. I like that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>In fact, I'm granting you permission to visit me
whenever you want. Next time you come, there's
a 90% chance I won't turn you into a frog!
<PAGE>
But today, I've got some other stuff to take care
of, so come back later, okay?

<FACE_WITCH><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Heh heh heh... This town is great.
